<Text: Vincent Drucci, also known as "The Schemer" (born Vincenzo D'Ambrosio; 1898 – April 4, 1927), was an Sicilian-American mobster during Chicago's Prohibition era who was a member of the North Side Gang, Al Capone's best known rivals.>

Text: Vincent Drucci:  A friend of Dean O'Banion, Drucci succeeded him by becoming co-leader.
Triplets:<Vincent Drucci
2:
--------------------
<Text: Vincent Drucci:  He is the only US organized crime boss to have been killed by a policeman.>
